A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I left the movie depressed\, I’m still depressed two days later. This film lessens the significance of the original trilogy and the original characters. This film goes from amazing\, to boring\, back to amazing and then soul crushing. I can’t believe one film in one moment could destroy a passion and a love I’ve had since the 70’s. I wish the Skywalker saga just end with Return of the Jedi. No prequels or sequels\, just the joy of the original Star Wars films.
